Reviews.Title: Closest thing to looking like a modern bullet camera available today
Reviews.Author: A. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Modern IP/network security cameras are white, and in the case of bullet cameras, slim. Most of the fake cameras are silver, which at this point is 1980's retro and not a viable ruse for home use. This fake camera is white, slim, a modern ergo design and has realistic looking LED bulbs surrounding the lens... all tell tail signs of a real IP camera being sold today. Spend the few extra dollars and get a fake camera that actually looks like a modern IP camera, because IT geeks and well researched criminals can tell the difference!

Reviews.Title: Realistic
Reviews.Author: JOE SMOTZ
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and works great!!  Item complements decor of area where put and has a;ready been noticed by those handing out flyers etc.!

ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable fake IR bullet security camera for your home surveillance
Build-in a continuous flashing light and fake IR LEDs
Can be mounted on wall or ceiling
The camera requires 2 AA batteries (not included)
A security warning sticker included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Fake Bullet Dummy Imitation Security Camera Simulated Decoy Infrared IR LED Camera with Blinking Light WL4
